title: Next.js E-commerce Store
description: Built a fast, SEO-friendly e-commerce store using Next.js, Stripe, and Tailwind CSS.

title: React Real-time Chat App
description: Implemented a scalable real-time chat application with WebSocket and Node.js backend.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Created a responsive portfolio site with React, showcasing projects and blogs.

title: Weather Forecast Dashboard
description: Developed a weather app with OpenWeatherMap API and dynamic charts using Chart.js.

title: Task Management Tool
description: Built a Kanban-style task manager with drag-and-drop features using React DnD.

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: Mobile-first app tracking workouts and nutrition with React Native and Firebase.

title: Recipe Finder
description: Search recipes by ingredients with Edamam API integration and user favorites.

title: Travel Blog
description: A travel blog featuring interactive maps and photo galleries with GatsbyJS.

title: Online Learning Platform
description: Developed a full-featured online course platform with video streaming and quizzes.

title: Music Streaming Service
description: Built a music player with playlists, search, and recommendations using Spotify API.

title: Event Planning App
description: An app for creating and managing events with RSVP and calendar integration.

title: Photo Gallery Website
description: Responsive photo gallery with filtering and fullscreen slideshow using React.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Track expenses and income with charts and monthly reports using React and Chart.js.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Dashboard showing social media stats with dark/light mode toggles and charts.

title: Customer Support Chatbot
description: Implemented a chatbot using Dialogflow to automate customer support queries.
